mapper.select: select a.sno , a.resort, a.title, a.content,a.contact, a.mno ,a.area, a.categori, a.viewcnt,a.complete, a.regdate,a.offerdate,a.enddate,a.bookmarkcnt,b.mno,b.id,b.name,b.img from ( select sno , resort, title, content,contact, mno ,area, categori, viewcnt,complete, regdate,offerdate,enddate,bookmarkcnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by complete, sno desc) AS SNUM from social where 1=1 AND CATEGORI = #{categori} AND title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND id LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND (TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') or (CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') AND resort = #{resort} AND OFFERDATE between TO_char(#{offerdate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(#{offerdateEnd}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND complete='N' ) a left outer join member b on a.mno = b.mno where SNUM between #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} order by a.complete , a.sno desc
